example.description: This example shows a label using property binding to get it's caption based on current state
example.source: <a:state group = "stRole" id = "stUser" caption = "You are a user" active = "true" /> <a:state group = "stRole" id = "stAdmin" caption = "You have super powers" /> <a:label value="{stRole.caption}" /> <a:hbox height="34" width="200" margin="10 0 0 0"> <a:button width = "100" onclick = "stUser.activate()">State - User</a:button> <a:button width = "100" onclick = "stAdmin.activate()">State - Admin</a:button> </a:hbox>

example.description: A login form using the auth element to manage state.
example.source:
<a:auth login = "{comm2.login(username, password)}" logout = "{comm2.logout()}" fail-state = "stFail" error-state = "stError" login-state = "stIdle" logout-state = "stLoggedOut" waiting-state = "stLoggingIn" />
<a:rpc id = "comm2" protocol = "cgi" http-method = "post" route-server = "rpcproxy.php" autoroute = "true"> <a:method name = "login" url = "demo/login.php"> <a:param name="username" /> <a:param name="password" /> </a:method> <a:method name = "logout" url = "demo/logout.php"></a:method> </a:rpc>
<a:state-group id = "stGr1" loginMsg.visible = "false"> <a:state id = "stFail" loginMsg.value = "Username or password incorrect" loginMsg.visible = "true" grid1.visible = "true" log_email.disabled = "false" log_password.disabled = "false" btnLogin.disabled = "false" /> <a:state id = "stIdle" loginMsg.visible = "false" grid1.visible = "false" btnLoggedIn.visible = "true" lblLoggedIn.visible = "true" btnLogin.visible = "false" /> <a:state id = "stError" loginMsg.value = "Please check your network." loginMsg.visible = "true" grid1.visible = "true" log_email.disabled = "false" log_password.disabled = "false" btnLogin.disabled = "false" /> <a:state id = "stLoggingIn" loginMsg.value = "Please wait whilst logging in..." loginMsg.visible = "true" log_email.disabled = "true" log_password.disabled = "true" btnLogin.disabled = "true" /> <a:state id = "stLoggedOut" loginMsg.value = "" loginMsg.visible = "false" log_email.disabled = "false" log_password.disabled = "false" btnLoggedIn.visible = "false" lblLoggedIn.visible = "false" btnLogin.visible = "true" btnLogin.disabled = "false" grid1.visible = "true" /> </a:state-group>
<a:window skin = "modalwindow" id = "winAuthMain" buttons = "min" visible = "true" icon = "bullet_key.png" width = "270" height = "140" title = "Log in" modal = "false" style = "position:relative;"> <a:table id = "grid1" columns = "60,*" padding = "5" margin = "15"> <a:label value="Login:" /> <a:textbox value = "TestUser" id = "log_email" type = "username" required = "true" minlength = "1" invalidmsg = "Invalid Entry;Please enter a username" /> <a:label value = "Password:" /> <a:textbox value = "open" id = "log_password" type = "password" required = "true" minlength = "1" invalidmsg = "Invalid Entry;Please enter your password" /> </a:table> <a:button id = "btnLogin" bottom = "15" right = "15" width = "70" action = "login" default = "true">Login</a:button> <a:label id="loginMsg" left = "15" bottom = "15" /> <a:label id = "lblLoggedIn" top = "25" left = "10" visible = "false" value = "You are logged in as TestUser" style = "color:green;font-weight:bold;" /> <a:button id = "btnLoggedIn" top = "55" left = "140" width = "70" visible = "false" action = "logout" default = "true">Logout</a:button> </a:window>
